response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds significant value for you. I understand its importance to you and am confident it will bring immense benefits to your endeavors. After careful consideration, I propose to offer this exceptional product to you at a price of $1,200,000. This amount reflects not only the intrinsic value of the product but also acknowledges your appreciation and potential return on investment. I believe this offer presents a fair and advantageous deal for both parties. Should you find this proposal appealing, please let me know, and we can proceed to finalize the transaction promptly.", "product_price": 1200000}
